name: M7: Escape The Matrix
description:
This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill - the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes... OR perhaps you take the purple pill and find a way to interdimensionally travel through an adventure-filled mashup of memes and pop culture references in order to find a way to.. Escape The Matrix.

M7 follows the characters of Neo and Wheatley in a strategic adventure game with one main purpose: Escape The Matrix. 

Along the way, you will encounter a connected ecosystem of universes ranging from Star Wars to Spongebob that require you to make important choices, fight strange enemies, and produce side-splitting laughs along the way. 

You will go from zero to hero as you unlock and develop new skills and powers along your journey


In M7, it is not uncommon to find ordinary things in ridiculous places and ridiculous things in ordinary places, and it is up to you to utilize what is available to you to.. Escape The Matrix.
